statements: UPDATE marketing_campaigns SET budget = 5000, clicks = 100 WHERE campaign_id = 1;
UPDATE marketing_campaigns SET end_date = '2023-12-31', conversions = 20 WHERE campaign_name = 'Holiday Sale';
UPDATE marketing_campaigns SET budget = 5000.00, conversions = 100 WHERE campaign_id = 1
UPDATE marketing_campaigns SET clicks = clicks + 50, budget = budget * 1.1 WHERE campaign_id = 2
UPDATE ROI_metrics SET engagement_metrics = 0.75 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE Marketing_campaigns SET budget = 10000, end_date = '2023-12-31' WHERE campaign_id = 5;
UPDATE ROI_metrics SET engagement_metrics = 0.75, conversion_rate = 0.10 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE Marketing_campaigns SET budget = 50000, end_date = '2022-12-31', start_date = '2022-01-01' WHERE campaign_id = 10;
UPDATE chatbot_metrics SET metric_value = 10.5 WHERE metric_id = 1;
UPDATE campaign_performance SET clicks = 500, impressions = 1000 WHERE performance_id = 2;
UPDATE chatbot_metrics SET metric_value = 10.5 WHERE metric_id = 1;
UPDATE campaign_performance SET clicks = clicks + 5, conversions = conversions - 2 WHERE performance_id = 3;
UPDATE chatbot_messages SET message_text='Welcome to our chatbot!' WHERE message_id=1;
UPDATE campaign_metrics SET clicks=150, impressions=200 WHERE metric_id=3;
